definition: contract of alliance/oath or treaty between allies
oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: But they, like Adam, have transgressed the covenant, there have they dealt treacherously against me.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们在阿当就违犯了盟约，在那里已背叛了我。

sentences.english: The beautiful topiary trees are witnesses of our marriage.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫鲜花柱见证我们的婚盟约誓。

sentences.english: They covenanted in loyalty to the king.
The name Mithras was the Persian word for 'contract'.
sentences.chinese: 密特拉神的名字波斯语叫做“盟约”。

sentences.english: He confirmed his decree to Jacob, to Israel his eternal covenant.
sentences.chinese: 为雅各伯立为不移的规条，向以色列立为永远的盟约。

sentences.english: Ours is a generation that has witnessed the abrogation of the parent-child covenant.
sentences.chinese: 我这一代正是废除了亲子盟约必要性的见证。

sentences.english: Asherah has made (a pact) with us.
Take seriously your Covenant of Love with God.
sentences.chinese: 郑重对待你与天主订立的爱的盟约。

sentences.english: The covenant of the league of nations bound all signatory states not to go to war .
sentences.chinese: 国际联盟盟约规定，所有签字国都不得诉诸战争。

sentences.english: Phinees our father, by being fervent in the zeal of God, received the covenant of an everlasting priesthood.
sentences.chinese: 我们的祖先丕乃哈斯因为热诚，才获永为司祭的盟约。

sentences.english: Ours is a generation that has witnessed the abrogation of the parent-child covenant.
sentences.chinese: 我这一代正是废除亲子盟约必要性的见证。

sentences.english: They covenanted in loyalty to the king.
sentences.chinese: 他们缔结盟约以效忠国王。

sentences.english: He will confirm a covenant with many for one 'seven.
sentences.chinese: 一七之内，他必与许多人坚定盟约。

sentences.english: According to these articles did the Romans covenant with the people of the Jews.
sentences.chinese: 根据这些话，罗马人同犹太民族签定了盟约。

sentences.english: And I will make you subject to my sceptre, and will bring you into the bands of the covenant.
sentences.chinese: 我要使你们在我的杖下经过，引你们受盟约的束缚。

sentences.english: Who forsakes the partner of her youth and forgets her sacred convenant;
sentences.chinese: 她离弃幼年的配偶，忘了神的盟约。

definition: to form an alliance/to ally oneself with/allied with/aligned/to bond with
meetings conducted by rulers in feudal China for the purpose of formalizing alliances, finalizing treaties
credentials (of a diplomat)/documents exchanged between nations/national or dynastic history book
